title: Vegan peanut and tomato stew
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '2 small red onions, finely chopped', '6 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 green pepper, diced', '50g (2 oz) crushed peanuts', '4 large tomatoes, coarsely chopped', '350ml (12 fl oz) water', 'salt and cayenne pepper to taste']
